# 90-Day CSCRF Roadmap

## Phase 1 (Day 0-30)
- Close PR.AA.G1 mandatory gaps.

## Phase 2 (Day 31-60)
- Harden privileged access controls for PR.AA.G2.

## Phase 3 (Day 61-90)
- Run closure validation and management sign-off.

## Ongoing Compliance Calendar
- Quarterly: access rights review
- Annual: policy review and board acknowledgement
